title: HUGE Delay In Abilities and Movement
body: So ever since the latest patch, I load into game fine, but it's almost like I cannot move. The game even shows I clicked, but I can barely move, or cast abilities. They're all EXTREMELY delayed, even though I am getting a constant 29 MS and 60-100 FPS. I don't know what is causing this, but I thought I could come here to get some help.

replies.body: Hmmmm that sounds a lot like packet loss tbh. Do me a favor and run a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and post the results here for me. Packet loss happens between your network and our servers, so there's typically not a lot we can do other than hope your ISP straightens out the issue.

Also used command prompt if this one also helps:

1    46 ms     2 ms     1 ms  10.246.79.254
  2     2 ms     3 ms    10 ms  192.168.50.30
  3     2 ms     1 ms     1 ms  hezekiah.sbts.edu [10.245.1.10]
  4    28 ms     2 ms     2 ms  4.14.173.1
  5     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  6     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  7    22 ms    22 ms    22 ms  104.160.131.1
